about_the_game:
Nikola Nikita Jeremić, a composer famous for his many well-known projects, is now bringing the Stray Blade soundtrack to life, including over 25 tracks.

Enjoy a variety of different styles played on dark, modern synthesizers backed by a rich and powerful orchestral arrangement. Join Boji and enjoy lots of epic tracks.

All provided in mp3 format.
detailed_description:
Nikola Nikita Jeremić, a composer famous for his many well-known projects, is now bringing the Stray Blade soundtrack to life, including over 25 tracks.

Enjoy a variety of different styles played on dark, modern synthesizers backed by a rich and powerful orchestral arrangement. Join Boji and enjoy lots of epic tracks.

All provided in mp3 format.

name: Stray Blade Soundtrack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Storage: 910 MB available space
  • Storage (high-quality audio): Additional 230 MB available space
